h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Sweet Ice Location
content: The Sweet Ice Soak can be found in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West, specifically at the Temple Entrance Shrine. From the Shrine, follow the path to the middle-right and through the red building's opening to get to the main plaza.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sweet_Ice.md', within the main section titled 'Sweet Ice', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Sweet Ice Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Sweet Ice Soak can be found in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West, specifically at the Temple Entrance Shrine. From the Shrine, follow the path to the middle-right and through the red building's opening to get to the main plaza.
